title: CORNER UNIT / RIVER VIEWS / FLOOR TO CEILING WINDOWS / LAUNDRY IN UNIT
posting_body: ['CORNER UNIT / RIVER VIEWS / FLOOR TO CEILING WINDOWS / LAUNDRY IN UNIT / GYM / ROOF DECK / CONCIERGE', 'Listing ID #: 211345', 'Price: $9,424', 'Property Type: Apartment', 'Bedrooms: 2.0', 'Bathrooms: 2.0', 'Approx.', 'Size: 1,261 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Building Amenities', 'Business Center', 'Common Outdoor Space', 'Concierge', 'Diplomats OK', 'Doorman', 'Elevator', 'Garage', 'Green Building', 'Health Club', 'Laundry', 'Lounge', 'Pool', 'Receiving Room', 'Roof Deck', 'Storage', 'Valet', 'Wheelchair Access', 'Welcome to your new home!', 'Upon entering this beautifully proportioned unit, you will be WOWED at every turn in this exquisite residence.', 'Peace and serenity await you while the excitement of the all the city has to offer is a short ride away.', 'Residents enjoy unparalleled lifestyle services and amenities.', 'Building amenities include 24-hour concierge service, landscaped roof terrace with organic herb gardens, children’s playroom featuring classes hosted by Creative Play, resident’s fitness center with complimentary daily classes and on-site parking with electric vehicle charging stations.', 'Secluded and well-manicured, Battery Park City makes for a quiet and scenic escape from the chaos and energy of Lower Manhattan.', 'The Esplanade offers 36 acres of public park space linked by a pedestrian greenway.', "Battery Park City offers some of the city's best sunset views.", 'For showings contact:', 'Adel Talebpour / The Bouklis Group / 212-961-7334 (cell) / <URL> / <URL> / <URL>', 'Adel Talebpour', 'Phone: 212-402-7855', 'Mobile: 212-961-7334', 'Email: <URL>', 'The Bouklis Group \xa0 212-402-7855 \xa0 212-961-7334 \xa0 <URL>', 'POSTED BY REALTYMX™', 'To view, call or text Adel Talebpour at 212-961-7334']
